<h3 id="X31458">X(31458) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {CIRCUMCIRCLE, SPIEKER, STEINER}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*a^4-4*(b^2+c^2)*a^2-6*(b+c)*b*c*a+(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
